title: "Tips for Capturing Attention in Conversations"
first_phrase: In the previous text, we learned about different methods to keep people's attention during a conversation. Now, we will focus on how to behave when someone is talking to you. The text provides two alternative methods, including how to maintain control over oneself and when to look away. These methods are essential in communication and have been studied in different psychological disciplines, such as NLP. Let's dive in to learn more.

last_phrase: In conclusion, when it comes to listening to someone speak, it's important to maintain control over your own thoughts and emotions. Avoid staring at the person the entire time and instead glance away occasionally to give yourself time to reflect on what is being said. Remember, taking a bit of space for yourself can give you the opportunity to think and reason, even in situations where someone is trying to exert influence over you.
